name: RedHole
description:
・Release"Space"  |  Refrection (& -1sec)

・JustRelease"Space"  |  Cure&Refrection (& -2sec)

・"Space"Hold  |  CatchGreenBullet

Supplement  :  Health is Center Value

It is a game that bounces bullets. Let's release the button at the right time.If you bounce back at the last minute, your strength will recover.(be Google Translation)

50sec > A

60sec > B

70sec > C

else : D
